monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever another Monster in the party would spend Mana, 25% of the needed Mana is taken from this Monster instead.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies Applies Burn, Chill, Shock or Poison

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Exploit Party
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party exploits an enemy's weakness with an attack, it gains a random Buff and shields by 5% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ion Beam
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (wind) Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Magic Barrier
skills.description: Aura: All Mage Monster in the party start the combat with a shield equal to 150% of their Max Mana and receive 1% less damage for every 100 Max Mana.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Buffer
skills.description: When consuming or losing mana, shield self by 300% of that amount.

skills.name: Mana Donor
skills.description: Aura: Whenever another Monster in the party would spend Mana, 25% of the needed Mana is taken from this Monster instead.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Shared Sorcery
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Sorcery (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Sorcery.

skills.name: Solar Blaze
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Solar Burst
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 105% (210%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Sorcerer
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Sorcery (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Magic value.

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Wizardry
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
